dcterms:creator: Annette Höglund
Pierre Dönnes
Torsten Blum
Hans-Werner Adolph
Oliver Kohlbacher
dcterms:description: The dataset contains 5959 proteins annotated to one of 11 different subcellular locations. Protein sequences were truncated to length 1000, focusing on the N- and C-terminal regions known to contain sorting signals.
dcterms:title: MultiLoc Dataset
